questions.text: What country does George get his baldness cure from?
questions.explanation:
China.

	George decides to take a chance and order the cream he saw on CNN the night before.  Jerry's repairman also thinks that it's a good idea.

questions.text: Who gave Kramer the video camera?
questions.explanation:
Specter.

	Specter is giving all of his stuff away to become a minimalist, so Kramer got his video camera, and he plans to take before and after shots of Georges hair.

questions.text: What was Jerry trying to record?
questions.explanation:
His act.

	Jerry brought his tape recorder to record his act, but some woman ended up taping a dirty message on it, so he tells the guys.

questions.text: Who was the voice on Jerry's tape?
questions.explanation:
Elaine.

	Elaine reveals the fact to George in Monk's while Jerry is talking to one of his old friends named Beder.

questions.text: When the group pretends to be on the set of an adult film on Kramer's camera, is Jerry the director?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Jerry pretends that some people from the coast guard found her and he discovered her for the movie.  The game is cut short when Kramer's Chinese food arrives.

questions.text: Who translates the call for George's hair growth cream?
questions.explanation:
A delivery boy.

	George gets the call translated by the guy who delivered Kramer's food.  The guy ends up getting into a conversation with the guy on the other line and Jerry gets mad.

questions.text: Does George ever get the cream?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	George ends up wearing the cream and he finds out it stinks really bad.  He has to wear it all day, but he takes it off when he discovers that Elaine is coming up to Jerry's apartment.

questions.text: What was the name of the woman Jerry got the name of from the comedy bar?
questions.explanation:
Alisha.

	Elaine makes sure that she's updated on all of Jerry's steps to meet the mystery woman so that she can play along with the story.  He tries to meet Alisha, and she pulls back.

questions.text: Who does George tell about his attraction to Elaine?
questions.explanation:
Jerry.

	He tells Jerry who demands an explanation, so George tells Jerry that Elaine was the voice on the tape.

questions.text: How many people end up discovering who the voice on the tape was?
questions.explanation:
Three.

	George tells Jerry before Elaine goes to the apartment, and Kramer discovers the fact in the very end of the episode.  Elaine leaves before anyone could do anything.
